thread.title: Like PCT on Facebook; Follow PCT’s Twitter Feed
thread.title_full: Like PCT on Facebook; Follow PCT’s Twitter Feed

title: Like PCT on Facebook; Follow PCT’s Twitter Feed
text:
Subscribe Like PCT on Facebook; Follow PCT’s Twitter Feed Stay on top of the market with PCT’s social media updates, including Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn and more. October 8, 2015 Brad Harbison 
Stay on top of the market with PCT’s social media updates, including Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn and more. Get your PCT news updates on-the-go by subscribing to PCT’s Twitter feed https://twitter.com/PCTMagazine . The feed includes the latest industry news, as well as links to audio and video files, and is a great way to keep updated on your mobile devices. Follow PCT on Facebook at www.facebook.com/pages/PCT-Magazine/90176769577 for news stories, PCT promotions and to network with more than 1,400 industry colleagues. Related Seattle Pest Control Firm Taps Marshawn Lynch for New Ad Campaign October 1, 2015 
The campaign includes 30-second TV spots featuring the NFL running back being asked a series of humorous questions by reporters, to which he replies "Stop bugging me." Read More [Talking Technology] My Journey Using a Call Center September 7, 2015 
Learn the good, the bad and the ugly one PMP encountered when he went from fielding calls via his office staff to a dedicated call center. Read More Terminix to Acquire Capelouto Termite & Pest Control July 23, 2015 
Capelouto Termite & Pest Control, a long-time Tallahassee area company, announced the sale of its assets to Terminix. Read More The Pulse
